short_summary: Request for Proposal - Training Facilitators level 1 and level 3
description: Employment and Social Development requires five (5) level 1 training facilitators, and five (5), level 3 training facilitators for delivering Enhanced Confidence to Communications virtual training course for ESDC call center employees.
